info.name: the (2,3,infinity) tiling
info.description: In the Poincare half-plane model, the symmetries are functions f(z)=(az+b)/(cz+d) where a,b,c,d are real numbers and ad-bc=1.  For this tiling, the symmetries are those functions where a,b,c,d are integers.  This animates (2z+1)/(z+1).
